explanation: The stage direction 'Les violons jouent un branle pendant que Polydas parle et que les conviés dansent.' describes music being played by violins, which falls under the category of music. The action of the violins playing a tune while characters speak and dance fits the definition of music description.
stgdir: Les violons jouent un branle pendant que Polydas parle et que les conviés dansent.
